title: USV Pharma leads race to buy 85% stake in Wellbeing Nutrition at Rs 1,600 crore valuation
desc: The Mumbai-based brand, owned by Nutritionlab, counts Hindustan Unilever and Fireside Ventures among its early backers. HUL and Fireside — holding 19.8% stake each — will exit with more than fourfold returns. Both invested in Wellbeing Nutrition about three years ago when the company was valued at about Rs 350 crore.

title: Highguard’s developer reportedly lays off ‘most’ of its staff just over two weeks after launch
desc: Highguard developer Wildlight Entertainment has laid off “most of the team,” according to a former staffer on LinkedIn. Highguard launched in late January.

title: Canada urges NATO to make Arctic Sentry initiative permanent
desc: Canada's foreign minister is urging NATO to make its newly launched Arctic Sentry initiative a permanent part of the alliance's operations. Anita Anand argues the High North can no longer be treated as a secondary theatre.

title: US House votes to overturn Trump's tariffs on Canada
desc: Six Republican lawmakers joined Democrats to back a resolution that seeks to end the tariffs Trump imposed on Canada last year.

title: WPR Music new album of the week: 'Violin Café'
desc: This week’s album of the week comes from Scottish violinist Nicola Benedetti, who has been electrifying audiences since she was a teenager.

title: USA's Chock and Bates win Olympic ice dance silver : NPR
desc: Chock and Bates, four-time Olympians, were heavily favored for gold. But they lost by less than two points to a French duo who has been clouded by controversy involving their former partners.

title: Border patrol chief praised federal agent who shot US citizen in Chicago
desc: New evidence shows Gregory Bovino hailed agent who fired at Marimar Martinez five times in her car

title: How a speech about ‘small moments’ may impact Canada’s hockey fate at the Olympics
desc: Almost a year later, coach Jon Cooper’s 4 Nations speech still resonates with those players

title: Iron Ore Edged Up After China’s Central Bank Offered Support
desc: PBoC support and stronger metals sentiment lifted prices, even as property stays weak and car sales fall, pushing steel demand further toward manufacturing.

title: Ex-teacher trades singlehood for instant family
desc: PETALING JAYA: Having happily embraced singlehood for years, retired teacher Susan Khoo never expected her circumstances to change so dramatically at the age of 63.
